Ms. Kun, 30, an associate producer for “60 Minutes,” met the Olympic fencer Tim Morehouse, 34, in January 2011.
results.title: VOWS; Rachael Kun and Tim Morehouse

results.body:
SOMETIMES being famous is like attending your own funeral.
 
Chris Colfer learned as much at the ripe age of 18, when he was cast as the plucky gay countertenor Kurt Hummel on “Glee.” Armed with a golden voice and an uncanny ability to cry on cue (his secret: think of eye injuries), Mr. Colfer became a poster boy for bullying
results.title: Many Hats of Chris Colfer

results.title: T MAGAZINE; Pretty Tomes
